name: The Stairs (Ezki_Jams_Account)
description:
Short platformer made for learning UE4.

Reach the top, collect all the funky, dancing items that float over the ground while rickrolling you, and don't fall on the way

Credits to Jean Charpentier, for his well made course on UE4

I do not own the music assets present in the game

The build is only for Windows x64
